name: Come On! Heroes
synopsis: In a green field there is this small hill, and on the hill there are flowers... wait, where are the flowers!? OK, it must be the Heiress. This lively heiress snuck out of the family mansion to follow a burglar out of curiosity. The burglar, Archer, decides to kidnap the Heiress immediately for ransom, and ordered his men to handle her with care. The Heiress is happy in Archer's mansion. She doesn't realize her position, so she orders the men around. In the meantime, her father (Mr.King) receives Archer's message and announces that anyone who brings back his daughter will receive a great reward. So a bunch of men, including those from other wealthy families, lead their men to Archer's mansion... Game Features: An action game that tests your reaction Defend your "Lovely Heiress" with an assortment of weapons, such as fire wall, landmine, etc.
